name: Roasted Asparagus
description: The perfect side for any meal - simple, elegant, delicious.
preparation: Mix olive oil, Herb & Garlic Dip Mix, and Vegetable Seasoning. Brush olive oil mixture over asparagus spears and generously season with Sea Salt and Pepper. Spread over Sheet Pan lined with parchment paper.
Roast in oven for about 10 minutes. Serve warm.

products.name: Herb & Garlic Dip Mix
summary: Classic notes of chives, onion & garlic.

products.name: Vegetable Seasoning
summary: All-in-one herby meal helper. Less measuring & more flavor!

products.name: Sheet Pan
summary: Lightweight all-purpose baking sheet made from a single piece of aluminum, with a one-inch rim.
